title: Spaghetti Carbonara
instructions: Cook spaghetti in a large pot of boiling salted water, stirring occasionally, until al dente. Drain and reserve 1 cup of pasta water.
Meanwhile, cook pancetta in a large skillet over medium heat, stirring occasionally, until crispy. Remove from heat.
In a medium bowl, whisk eggs, Parmesan cheese, Pecorino Romano cheese, and a generous amount of black pepper together.
Add drained spaghetti to the skillet with pancetta, and toss to combine. Pour egg mixture over pasta and quickly toss to coat. Add some reserved pasta water if the sauce is too thick.
Serve immediately with more cheese and black pepper, if desired.
